articles.title: Sridevi 3rd Death Anniversary: Janhvi Kapoor says ‘miss u’ as she shares handwritten note by late star to her - PINKVILLA
articles.description: Known as one of the legendary actresses of Indian cinema, Sridevi is known for her stupendous acting skills. The actress passed away in Dubai, right after attending a family wedding.
